name: Sarah De Gasperis
bio: Sarah is a trained goldsmith, passionate about her craft. A native of Toronto whose love of travel led her to study in Cordoba, Spain. There she completed a two-year goldsmith program at the Consorcio Escuela de Joyeria de Cordoba and later received a study grant apprenticeship in Hamburg, Germany. Her work has been featured in various magazines, as well as published in several books in both Canada and Europe. Sarah draws her inspiration from nature, ancient civilizations, mythical creatures and all things magical. She enjoys working instinctively, allowing each piece the opportunity to unfold on its own.
